class.name: commander.ontology.MeKnowledge
class.description: Represent the knowledge of the commander physical abilities.

method.name: issueMoveToOrder
method.description: For the commander, the ability to issue a mission to a subordinate. Returns 'true' upon action completion (once the order has been sent).

argument.name: subordinate
argument.description: The agent subordinate to the commander that receives the order.

argument.name: missionName
argument.description: The name of the mission to be performed by the subordinate ("agent.behaviors.tasks.moveTo" for instance).

argument.name: waypoints
argument.description: The waypoints to be reached by each subordinate. Waypoints form a path defined by the user, as an ordered set of "position" objects.

method.name: sendMessage
method.description: Simple action of sending a 'string' message toward the sword gaming user interface.

method.name: getPosition
method.description: Integration method that returns the simmulation position of this element. This method is used by integration layer. It should not be used within a skill.
